question:
You recently took a long vacation. In your absence a friend did you a huge favor.
Write a letter thanking to your friend. ın your letter:
Explain what the favor was
Desribe how this favor helped you
Offer compansation
Write at least 150 word
text: How are you? I hope this letter finds you well. I am writing this letter to express my sincere gratitude from bottom of my heart for your extended support to my parents despite your busy schedule with your daily office work.

You have offered a daily ride to my father which was a great relief to me as  my father cannot drive his car due to the new local traffic rules. In addition, the way you supplied our daily shopping needs was really a priceless service. On top of that, during daytime support, you helped my father with gardening work as well and I can feel the amount of time you spent at my gardening cleaning along with the making the fence .

Despite your busy work schedule, you helped  my family all the way. I know, saying just thank you is easy and not at all satisfying to me and my family. Hence, I would like to invite you to my home to have a great lunch next week. Please feel free to let us know your availability and do not hesitate to call me on my mobile number.
I cannot wait anymore to see you and have a great lunch with my parents.
